statements: UPDATE patient_outcomes SET treatment = 'Medication A' WHERE patient_id = 123;
UPDATE patient_outcomes SET outcome = 'Recovered', discharge_date = '2022-05-10' WHERE patient_name = 'Alice Smith';
UPDATE patient_outcomes SET outcome = 'Recovered' WHERE patient_id = 101 AND diagnosis = 'Pneumonia';
UPDATE patient_outcomes SET treatment = 'Physical Therapy' , discharge_date = '2022-09-20' WHERE patient_id = 205 AND diagnosis = 'Fracture'
UPDATE Patients SET diagnosis = 'Flu' WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE Outcomes SET readmission = 'true', outcome_description = 'Patient recovered well' WHERE outcome_id = 201;
UPDATE Patients SET patient_name='John Doe', diagnosis='Fever' WHERE patient_id=1;
UPDATE Outcomes SET outcome_date='2021-10-15', readmission=TRUE, outcome_description='Patient recovered completely' WHERE patient_id=3;
UPDATE patients SET age = 35, gender = 'Male' WHERE patient_id = 123;
UPDATE treatments SET cost = 500.25, treatment_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE treatment_id = 456;
UPDATE patients SET age = age + 1, gender = 'Female' WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE treatments SET cost = cost * 1.1, treatment_name = 'New Treatment' WHERE treatment_id = 201;
UPDATE Patients SET discharge_date = '2022-09-30' WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE Treatments SET cost = 250.00 WHERE treatment_id = 201;
UPDATE Patients SET discharge_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE Treatments SET cost = 1500.00, treatment_date = '2022-08-10' WHERE treatment_id = 201;
UPDATE patients SET patient_age = 35 WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE admissions SET treatment_plan = 'Physical therapy and medication' WHERE admission_id = 201;
UPDATE patients SET diagnosis = 'Updated Diagnosis', patient_age = 35 WHERE patient_id = 123;
UPDATE admissions SET treatment_plan = 'New Treatment Plan', diagnosis = 'Improved Diagnosis' WHERE admission_id = 456;
